CustomField.description: Stores the new value of field types Lookup, Hierarchical Relationship, Checkbox, Currency, Email, Geolocation, Number, Percent, Phone, Picklist, Text (Encrypted), and URL.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the new value of field types Lookup, Hierarchical Relationship, Checkbox, Currency, Email, Geolocation, Number, Percent, Phone, Picklist, Text (Encrypted), and URL.
CustomField.label: New Value
